attributes.title: Worst
attributes.review: I downloaded this app only to be hurt  by all the white supremacy and him say the n- word this is by far the worst app 😩 he called my kind porch monkeys

attributes.title: Worst🤢
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst. You can take it from me, this is not a fake news media drill. This app is the absolute worst. I do not endorse this app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE

So terrible, the server was very glitchy and keep logging out and it never worked,
It took ages to download worst app
On this App Store!
It asked for many of my passwords I am now hacked And my phone is pretty much broken this is a terrible app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: I got this app and it took forever to download, after it downloaded my while phone got hacked.

attributes.title: so bad
attributes.review: i hate this app so much, it was so bad that my grandma had to unplug her life support in order to escape the horror of this app 😖😖😖 it killed my pet rat, coco, which proves how horrible this app is. i had great expectations for this app, and it failed those expectations horribly. i cant even look at it without wanting to throw up.

attributes.title: Concerned American
attributes.review: They’re giving our info to Russia, and China. Do not download this app they are tracking you and killing your puppies and kittens

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Straight up garbage 0/10 would never recommend

attributes.title: If I could give this app -5 stars I would
attributes.review: I was just looking for a nice app that promotes inclusivity, positivity, anti-racism, and anti-homophobia and what I got was the exact opposite: the majority of trump supporters in America.
